properties.value: Training Hunter actively can pose a challenge if certain regions are not unlocked.  Kandarin✓ contains the most variety in hunter creatures, but there are options in other areas.  Misthalin✓ allows the semi-passive training of Hunter through bird house trapping, which can be completed every 50 minutes. The Natural History Quiz can also be completed in Misthalin at level 1 Hunter, and grants 1,000 base experience. This will bring Hunter to level 20 with the 5x boosted rate of relic tier 1.

Overview[edit | edit source]

Main article: Hunter training

Training Hunter actively can pose a challenge if certain regions are not unlocked. Kandarin✓ contains the most variety in hunter creatures, but there are options in other areas. Misthalin✓ allows the semi-passive training of Hunter through bird house trapping, which can be completed every 50 minutes. The Natural History Quiz can also be completed in Misthalin at level 1 Hunter, and grants 1,000 base experience. This will bring Hunter to level 20 with the 5x boosted rate of relic tier 1.

Elnock Inquisitor will only provide free Impling jars to players once, and more cannot be purchased without trading in implings (in jars). You may also receive one Impling Jar per day via the Leagues Tutor.

Equipment[edit | edit source]

There are only two Hunter shops and are the only place most Hunter equipment can be acquired.

  • Aleck's Hunter Emporium. in Yanille.
  • Nardah Hunter Shop in Nardah.
  • The Lunar spell Hunter Kit will produce a kit in the inventory which contains all the items sold in the shops. Lunar spells require Fremennik✓.
  • A teasing stick can be found in the Karamja Hunter area.

Training[edit | edit source]

Birdhouses[edit | edit source]

Main article: Bird house trapping

Birdhouses are a lucrative way to train hunter passively on Fossil Island.

The required clockworks can be made on a Crafting table 2 in the workshop of a player owned house. They require a steel bar and 8 Crafting.

Other notable methods[edit | edit source]

Region Hunting area level range Notable Creatures
Desert✓ Uzer Hunter Area 5-47 Orange salamanders
Karamja✓ Karamja Hunter area 41 Horned graahk
Kruk's Dungeon 60 Maniacal monkey (Hunter)
Fremennik✓ Rellekka Hunter area 1-55 Polar kebbits
Kandarin✓ Feldip Hunter area 1-63 Carnivorous chinchompas
Piscatoris Hunter Area 3-53 Copper longtails, Ferrets, Chinchompas
Piscatoris falconry area 43-69 Spotted, dark, and dashing kebbits
Ourania Hunter area 59 Red salamanders
Red chinchompa hunting ground[1] 63 Carnivorous chinchompas
Morytania✓ Canifis Hunter area 29 Swamp lizards
Tirannwn✓ Gwenith Hunter area 63 Carnivorous chinchompas
Wilderness✓ South of the Lava Maze 73 Black chinchompas
Boneyard Hunter area 67 Black salamanders
Misthalin✓ Fossil Island 80 [2] Herbiboars
  1. ^ Requires completion of hard Western Provinces Diary
  2. ^ Also requires 31 Herblore

Temporary boosts[edit | edit source]

Item Region Notes
Spicy stew (yellow spice) Desert✓ Boosts Hunter by ±0-5. Requires manual completion of the Freeing Evil Dave subquest in Recipe for Disaster.
Hunter potion Fremennik✓ Boosts Hunter by 3. Requires 53 Herblore and 51 Hunter for the secondary ingredient.

Skillcape[edit | edit source]

Item Region Master Notes
Hunter Cape Kandarin✓ Hunting expert Five teleports per day to the Red chinchompas in the Feldip Hunter area or to Black chinchompas.

{{TBL Guide Links}} ==Overview== {{Main|Hunter training}} Training [[Hunter]] actively can pose a challenge if certain regions are not unlocked. {{TB|Kandarin}} contains the most variety in hunter creatures, but there are options in other areas. {{TB|Misthalin}} allows the semi-passive training of Hunter through [[bird house trapping]], which can be completed every 50 minutes. The [[Natural History Quiz]] can also be completed in Misthalin at level 1 Hunter, and grants 1,000 base experience. This will bring Hunter to level 20 with the 5x boosted rate of relic tier 1. [[Elnock Inquisitor]] will only provide free [[Impling jar|Impling jars]] to players once, and more cannot be purchased without trading in [[implings]] (in jars). You may also receive one Impling Jar per day via the Leagues Tutor. ==Equipment== There are only two Hunter shops and are the only place most Hunter equipment can be acquired. * [[Aleck's Hunter Emporium.]] in [[Yanille]]{{TBIcon|Kandarin}}. * [[Nardah Hunter Shop]] in [[Nardah]]{{TBIcon|Desert}}. * The [[Lunar spell]] [[Hunter Kit (spell)|Hunter Kit]] will produce a [[hunter kit|kit]] in the inventory which contains all the items sold in the shops. Lunar spells require {{TB|Fremennik}}. * A [[teasing stick]] can be found in the [[Karamja Hunter area]]. ==Training== ===Birdhouses=== {{Main|Bird house trapping}} Birdhouses are a lucrative way to train hunter passively on [[Fossil Island]]. The required [[clockwork|clockworks]] can be made on a [[Crafting table 2]] in the [[workshop]] of a [[poh|player owned house]].
